I do not recommend them at all till things clear up."

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <heguli97> @Dark Angel I don't know if you have heard the news, old wallets don't "work" because of the new chain hush started using last month. https://myhush.org/sapling/

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <heguli97> Wallets that do support Hush now are the web wallet, Agama wallet 0.3.6 and Hushmate swing wallet

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Dark Angel> @heguli97 I read this news. It just became interesting whether the old wallets will continue to work.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <Dark Angel> @heguli97 on the old wallet remained HUSH. Because the wallet is not synchronized, then HUSH can not switch to a new wallet

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrd-hush] <heguli97> Ah okay, üòÄ, as i said above only the old swing wallet is not supported any longer, along with zelcore closed source wallet.

You can use your privatekeys to access your Hush on the new komodo based chain.

Content: [dscrd-hush] <Dark Angel> Thank you!!!
